desc: The Beaver Pellet Company produces 100% all natural, high quality, grilling pellets. The Beaver Pellet Co is a veteran owned company and offers a subscription box service that brings new and unique flavors delivered directly to your door.. Beaver Pellets are compatible with all pellet grills and made in the USA.

layout.text: Good food starts with good wood.
Premium grilling pellets delivered directly to your door.
